data.title: The Motivation Manifesto: 9 Declarations to Claim Your Personal Power by Brendon Burchard: New (2014)
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9781401948078 - 1st Edition - Hardcover - Hay House Inc - 2014 - Condition: New - Presents a pulsing, articulate, ferocious call to claim our personal power. This book reveals that the main motive of humankind is the pursuit of greater Personal Freedom. Num Pages: 256 pages. BIC Classification: VSP. Category: (P) Professional & Vocational; (U) Tertiary Education (US: College). Dimension: 217 x 162 x 24. Weight in Grams: 330. . 2014. First Edition, First Printing. Hardcover. . . . . - The Motivation Manifesto: 9 Declarations to Claim Your Personal Power
